body_html: That’s a related issue, but I think what Conner’s asking is a little easier than solving the general aliasing problem. He wants to see a warning/error when calling any pointwise kernel that modifies a tensor with one or more zero stride; that modification is signaled by whether the tensor is non-const in the signature to the pointwise functor used with THCPointwiseApply or a TensorIterator. so it at least seems like the information is available at the right place in the code.
